metadata.title: CVE-2023-52612 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: crypto:scomp - fix req->dst buffer overflow The req->dst buffer size should bechecked before copying from the scomp_scratch->dst to avoid req->dst bufferoverflow problem.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-7.7').
